strings.PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION: Shows the StarDate on your desktop and keeps you up to date with news for Trek fans.
strings.ABOUT_TEXT:
Google Ticker for Trekkers Gadget Copyright 2006 Google Shows the StarDate on your desktop and keeps you up to date with news for Trek fans.
This gadget is in no way affiliated with Paramount Pictures Corp. Star Trek and its various forms are trademarks of Paramount Pictures Corp.
